abstract: Justice Dept will not file civil fraud charges against Countrywide Financial co-founder Angelo R Mozilo; firm was one of biggest sellers of subprime mortgages ahead of financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department said it had decided against filing a civil fraud case against Mr. Mozilo, co-founder of Countrywide Financial.

headline.main: Angelo Mozilo Will Not Face U.S. Charges for Mortgage Fraud
headline.print_headline: Countrywide Co-Founder Will Not Face U.S. Lawsuit
